dcterms:creator: Sepp Hochreiter
Jürgen Schmidhuber
dcterms:description: A sequence regression problem designed to test the ability of recurrent models to capture long-term dependencies by adding two numbers from a sequence based on indicator positions.
dcterms:title: Adding Problem Dataset

dcterms:creator: Sepp Hochreiter
Jürgen Schmidhuber
dcterms:description: A sequence classification problem that tests the ability of recurrent models to extract information from the temporal order of inputs.
dcterms:title: 3-Bit Temporal Order Problem Dataset

dcterms:creator: Sepp Hochreiter
Jürgen Schmidhuber
dcterms:description: A dataset that involves reading strings and predicting the next symbol, requiring the model to learn long-term dependencies.
dcterms:title: Multi-Embedded Reber Grammar (mERG)

dcterms:creator: Quoc V. Le
Navdeep Jaitly
Geoffrey E. Hinton
dcterms:description: A sequence classification task where MNIST images are read pixel by pixel, with a permutation applied to the pixel order to create longer-term dependencies.
dcterms:title: Sequential pMNIST Dataset
